mapper.insert: insert into sport_db0.record ( user_id, date, time, type, step, distance, calorie, mean_speed, spent_time, start_time, end_time ) values ( #{user_id}, #{date}, #{time}, #{type}, #{step}, #{distance}, #{calorie}, #{mean_speed}, #{spent_time}, #{start_time}, #{end_time} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT user_id, date, SUM(step) AS step FROM sport_db0.record WHERE type = #{type} AND user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY date) t1 WHERE step = (SELECT MAX(step) FROM (SELECT SUM(step) AS step FROM sport_db0.record WHERE type = #{type} AND user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY date) t2)
SELECT id, user_id, MAX(step) AS step, spent_time, distance, calorie FROM sport_db0.record WHERE type = #{type} AND user_id = #{user_id} LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM sport_db0.record WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND date = #{date};
SELECT week(date) AS week, SUM(step) AS step FROM sport_db0.record WHERE user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY WEEK(date);
SELECT MONTH (date) AS month, sum(step) AS step FROM sport_db0.record WHERE user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY MONTH(date);
SELECT sum(step) AS step, sum(distance) AS distance, sum(spent_time) AS spent_time, sum(calorie) AS calorie FROM sport_db0.record WHERE user_id = #{user_id};
